title: TensorFlow
body: The oggora GitHub repository has TensorFlow Object Detection and Segmentation samples using Docker Compose.

title: IP Geolocation
body: The map on the home page attempts to display your location using your IP address. An IP address can disclose your geographic location down to the city level. Read more on Wikipedia.

title: Intro
body: A microblog built with React, MUI and . A place to share and experiment.
